content: with another year of crocheting behind us it s time for our big annual granny stashdown challenge every year we do a stashdown cal and make a big fun granny blanket with the odds and ends we ve collected/accumulated over the course of the year are you ready to join us on a de-stash adventure this year we re going to make an awesome granny square blanket again as large or as small as you want using yarn on hand as we go you can just keep adding rounds until it s big as you like fun
